synopsis.text: As the Meiji Revolution sweeps through historical Japan, Hijikata Toshizou stands firm as the Vice Commander of the Shinsengumi, a formidable force dedicated to defending the Tokugawa shogunate. Known for his unwavering samurai spirit and ruthless determination, Toshizou's reputation as a skilled swordsman and relentless fighter precedes him. Despite the impending doom of the war and the tragic loss of his comrades, Toshizou remains steadfast in his beliefs, upholding his strict moral code and resolute loyalty to the shogunate. This anime offers a captivating glimpse into the life of a true samurai, depicting the struggles and triumphs of Hijikata Toshizou as he fights for his cause in the face of adversity.
